definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="75" y="85"><field name="trigger">on_entity_tick</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntitySkeleton</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text_binary_ops"><value name="A"><block type="entity_name"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Boss</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">replaceitem @e[type=skeleton, name=Boss] weapon.mainhand bow{Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:power",lvl:5s}]}</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">replaceitem @e[type=skeleton, name=Boss] weapon.mainhand diamond_sword{Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:sharpness",lvl:6s}]}</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
